text: was a Japanese long-distance runner. He won the 1956 edition of the Fukuoka Marathon. He represented Japan at the 1952 Summer Olympics, finishing in 26th place (2:38:11) and won the 1953 Boston Marathon. He was born in Akita. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese long-distance runners Category:Olympians for Japan
title: Keizo Yamada
